snippet: The tangled controversy surrounding Assemblyman Vito Lopez has presented the ethics commission with its first big challenge.
abstract: Editorial contends that the sexual harassment controversy surrounding New York Assemblyman Vito Lopez will present the first big test for the Joint Commission on Public Ethics; questions whether the commission is up to the task, given that it is made up entirely of political appointees, and asserts that Gov Cuomo should retain the option of appointing his own investigative panel.
lead_paragraph: The tangled controversy surrounding Assemblyman Vito Lopez has presented the ethics commission with its first big challenge.

headline.seo: The First Test for Albany’s Ethicists
